Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1C WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1C ( FORMATOD1CCODI, PROYCODI, PLANREDUCIR, ALTERNATIVA, OTRO, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1CCODI, :PROYCODI, :PLANREDUCIR, :ALTERNATIVA, :OTRO, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1C SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, PLANREDUCIR = :PLANREDUCIR, ALTERNATIVA = :ALTERNATIVA, OTRO = :OTRO, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1CCODI = :FORMATOD1CCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1C ORDER BY FORMATOD1CCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1C SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1C WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
